title: I am having difficulties breathing.
noAnswer: Great! No need to worry about your breathing.
yesAnswer: Please talk to a guardian and seek out a medical professional as soon as possible

title: Food tastes normal when I eat it
yesAnswer: Great! No need to worry about your taste.

title: My body feels hotter than usual
yesAnswer: Please check your temperature and talk to a guardian.
noAnswer: Great! No need to worry about your temperature.

title: I know someone close to me who has COVID-19.
yesAnswer: If you have been in contact with them within the past 2 weeks, please take a COVID-test and stay at home with your family.
noAnswer: If you have Covid-19, you probably didn't get it from them.

title: I went on a trip recently using a plane or a boat
yesAnswer: Make sure you self-isolate for 2 weeks and take a COVID test if you get any other symptoms.
noAnswer: No need to worry about that.
